name: Jakarta on a Sunday
description:
Sunday is the best time to explore Jakarta. The traffic is relatively mild, so moving around wouldn't be an issue. Sunday is also when locals go outs in the morning to exercise and chill in the afternoon/evening.

Itinerary-wise, you'll have the chance to visit a massive (and the only well-rehabilitated) mangrove forest in Jakarta and sample delicious Javanese (not Japanese) delicacies or fresh seafood.
